org.forgerock.openidm.jaspi.modules

Class IDMAuthenticationAuditLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.jaspi.modules.IDMAuthenticationAuditLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.auth.common.AuditLogger<javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo>, org.forgerock.jaspi.logging.JaspiAuditLogger

    public class IDMAuthenticationAuditLogger
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.jaspi.logging.JaspiAuditLogger
    Creates audit entries for each authentication attempt.

      • logAuthRequest

        protected void logAuthRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                  String username,
                  String userId,
                  List<String> roles,
                  boolean status,
                  String logClientIPHeader)
        Logs the authentication request.
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest that made the authentication request.
        username - The username of the user that made the authentication request.
        userId - The user id of the user that made the authentication request.
        roles - The roles of the user that made the authentication request.
        status - The status of the authentication request, either true for success or false for failure.
        logClientIPHeader - Whether to log the client IP in the header.
